html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-06002019-05-31,  ,  TC,  , 
ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Transportation Information Regulations (Air Travel Performance Data Collection)
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION INFORMATION REGULATIONS (AIR TRAVEL PERFORMANCE DATA COLLECTION) in order to (1) assist in assessing and monitoring the effectiveness of the Agency’s Air Passenger Protection Regulations; (2) assess and monitor air passengers’ experience, and make evidence-based policy changes; and, (3) monitor industry performance trends and inform consumers.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0166 Publication Date: 2019-06-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Transportation Information Regulations (Air Travel Performance Data Collection)
precis: Regulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION INFORMATION REGULATIONS (AIR TRAVEL PERFORMANCE DATA COLLECTION) in order to (1) assist in assessing and monitoring the effectiveness of the Agency’s Air Passenger Protection Regulations; (2)  assess and monitor air passengers’ experience, and make evidence-based policy changes; and, (3) monitor industry performance trends and inform consumers.
